SYSTEM: Ontologies%26Multilinguality.pdf: Página 11
©Guadalupe Aguado de Cea
11
1. OLA at the Terminological layer
•
Advantages: 
•
Increase of other languages is easily done by including just labels in the ontology.
•
Suitable for highly specialized domain ontologies: knowledge shareable among 
different linguistic community experts.
• Disadvantages: 
• Linguistic information included in the ontology is limited.
• Exact equivalence is assumed among labels in the different languages (though it may 
not be true).
rdfs: label
